results.title: Ivabradine and atenolol overdose managed with renal replacement therapy: A case report.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@Ivabradine@@@, an inhibitor of the sinoatrial pacemaker current, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, a cardioselective beta-blocker, are both used in the management of chronic @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure_Systolic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054143 @@@systolic heart failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Weigel B, Stott M, Tyler D, Ball M, Crutchfield C. Ivabradine and atenolol overdose managed with renal replacement therapy: A case report. Am J Emerg Med. 2025 May 29;():. PMID: 40461358
